sentences.en: One source is by desalination - taking the salt out of salt water to make it drinkable.

sentences.en: The device features low power consumption, big output, high desalination rate and high stability.

sentences.en: The device has two functions of seawater - desalination and dehumidification.

sentences.en: The Labor Premier , Geoff Gallop , proposed a $ 350 million desalination plant.
